body_html:
This is already done on master; the new location is tf.summary.FileWriter. see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/summary/summary.py#L61

I haven't removed tf.train.SummaryWriter, but I will before tf 1.0

body:
This is already done on master; the new location is tf.summary.FileWriter. see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/summary/summary.py#L61

I haven't removed tf.train.SummaryWriter, but I will before tf 1.0
